title: RIOT would make a killing from this, and it'd be hilarious.
body:
The 'give a gift in the post game screen' button has basically no purpose, its there for 3 reasons:

1. so that people can bribe their way into a win in a ranked game.

2. so that people can challenge eachother during a game (e.g. if we win this, you gotta mystery gift me, 1v1 me and winner gets a skin.)

3. to give friendly players a nice something for being fun :D (which is what riot thinks is happening, but probably has never happened since its implementation)

and either way, no gifts get bought for anyone at the end, (I've never taken part in either, but seen many people try start something)
now obviously the ranked win bribe isn't the greatest thing, and this idea wont affect it at all, which is good.
It will affect only the high stakes challenges that happen.

Have the option to gift actually in the game itself, its an option like /surrender, and you select an opponent, and choose the terms (e.g. next one of us to kill the other, next one of us to kill the other when we are both full hp and 1v1. who wins the game, etc etc.) then an accept/decline thing gets sent to them, and they click accept or decline, and are asked to confirm as well (unlike surrender), and then the winner of the challenge gets a gift immediately after the game from the losers RP (the loser has no control over this, so they cant reneg on the deal)

Obviously there will have to be restrictions like: how many challenges you can issue per week (to stop excessive gambling), and it would eb disabled in ranked games (so people wouldnt abandon the team to go 1v1 eachother.)

riot would make a killing off over-confident kids, and it'd be hilarious for the rest of the teams xD

thoughts?

replies.body:
So you think people will buy RP just to use it on this challenge? (Not insulting, just clarifying).

Btw this could actually make a really good separate gamemode if you removed the rewards for winning challenges and replaced it with buffs, or gold, or items.

And instead of been issued by players the AI would start challenges. It actually sounds really fun, and would make it pretty interesting especially for the current RGMs.

I count many people would buy it just for this, but cocky players who need to prove to everyone that they are the worlds best Yasuo, will get caught up in the moment and spend what they already have I'm sure. 

Youre right you know, that would make an epic game mode! we should suggest it.
